communications.subject: Mississippi Public Records Act Request: Beverage Partnerships
communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Mississippi Public Records Act, I hereby request the following records:

Agreements or partnerships related to sale, distribution, or marketing of beverages on campus and/or in athletics venues and facilities.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 7 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Kelly North

communications.subject: Re: Mississippi Public Records Act Request: Beverage Partnerships
communications.communication:
This email confirms The University of Southern Mississippi's receipt of your public records request. USM's Office of General Counsel will review the request and respond in the appropriate manner. Should you have related questions, you may reach that office at 601-266-4466.

Nicole Ruhnke
Chief Communication Officer
Office of University Communications
The University of Southern Mississippi
118 College Dr. #5016 | Hattiesburg, MS 39406<x-apple-data-detectors://2/0>
P: 601.266.5722<tel:601.266.5722>
